thread.title: MLS Cup Playoffs matchups, schedule and final standings: Decision Day recap
thread.title_full: MLS Cup Playoffs matchups, schedule and final standings: Decision Day recap | OregonLive.com

author: Tim Brown | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: MLS Cup Playoffs matchups, schedule and final standings: Decision Day recap
text:
With every Major League Soccer team playing Sunday -- and multiple playoff berths on the line -- they're billing it as MLS Decision Day.
The Portland Timbers defeated the Colorado Rapids 4-1 to earn the No. 3 seed and secure their spot in the MLS playoffs. They will host Sporting Kansas City this on Thursday at 7 p.m. PT at Providence Park with a trip to the semifinals on the line. Here's a look at the MLS Cup playoff field and schedule of games:
WESTERN CONFERENCE
Knockout Round | Home team listed first | (seed)
Seattle Sounders FC (4) vs. LA Galaxy (5)
10:00 PM ET, Wednesday, Oct. 28 | TV: UniM치s (US), TSN2 and RDS2 (Canada)
Portland Timbers (3) vs. Sporting KC (6)
10:00 PM ET, Thursday, Oct. 29 | TV: UniM치s (US), TSN1/4/5 (Canada)
Conference Semifinals
FC Dallas (1) vs. lowest-seeded KO Round winner
Leg 1: Sunday, Nov. 1 | Leg 2: Sunday, Nov. 8 at DAL | TV: FS1 or ESPN (US), TBD (Canada)
Vancouver Whitecaps FC (2) vs. other KO Round winner
Leg 1: Sunday, Nov. 1 | Leg 2: Sunday, Nov. 8 at VAN | TV: FS1 or ESPN (US), TBD (Canada)
EASTERN CONFERENCE
Knockout Round | Home team listed first | (seed)
D.C. United (4) vs. New England Revolution (5)
Time TBD, Wednesday, Oct. 28 | TV: UniM치s (US), TSN2 (Canada)
Montreal Impact (3) vs. Toronto FC (6)
7:00 PM ET, Thursday, Oct. 29 | TV: UniM치s (US), TSN1/4/5 & RDS1 (Canada)
Conference Semifinals
New York Red Bulls (1) vs. lowest-seeded KO Round winner
Leg 1: Sunday, Nov. 1 | Leg 2: Sunday, Nov. 8 at NY | TV: FS1 or ESPN (US), TBD (Canada)
Columbus Crew SC (2) vs. other KO Round winner
Leg 1: Sunday, Nov. 1 | Leg 2: Sunday, Nov. 8 at CLB | TV: FS1 or ESPN (US), TBD (Canada)
